title: Should RIOT Games make a new game?

embed.description: We believe the best games are made by player-focused teams, and as gamers, we strive to develop games we love to play. We create competitive, PvP, online games for gamers.

body:
Ok, over the last 6 years RIOT has had a major success in the gaming industry with the growth of League of Legends. They have had a lot of time and resources to make the community grow exponentially.

However I question the "Games" in their name. They literally have no other game in their arsenal.

So RIOT, why not make a new game and expand your reach even more?
Riot, you clearly loved the idea of making more games as your name literally "has Games" in it like a promise to future generations, so why not?

They clearly have the resources, the money and you even offer jobs as your site has 'Careers' on it.
So why not? New game? What do you guys think?

replies.body:
Check out this article that we put released late last year. http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20141012/1549/putting-s-riot-games

It takes time to develop and make a really good game so don't expect anything soon...but we are definitely looking into it.
Unfortunately, I can't move to one of these locations to apply, is there any programming opportunities for those of us elsewhere?

Hey man,

Unfortunately you would have to move if you wanted a specific job. However there are edge cases where superstars can negotiate specific locations to work from.

If you are the right person for the job Riot will definitely help relocate you to where you need to be though. Hope that helps.
If I wanted a job in the riot industry, what would I be required to do? or are there loads of different potentials for me to think about?

Hey man,

Here are a few links for you to check out;

http://www.riotgames.com/careers - For current available positions


A few FAQ's for applying to Riot
http://www.linkedin.com/grp/post/3544410-5956874323309375492
http://www.linkedin.com/grp/post/3544410-252312827
When you create a new game do you create the coding as well or is that done by another Riot member?

As long as they expand rather than divert their attention.. They constantly have input into League to keep it growing and being the gamee of choice for the biggest market. I bet they could definitely kick ass at a few other game ideas though.

Given that it is Riot Game**_S_** not Riot Game, I believe that they should make another game. Also, I believe that this game has few enough bugs as it is that they could relieve some staff to work on other games. If you need any help making one of the new games, message me. I am a game developer who is willing to help!

I really love league and would like to see you as a company devote your resources to it. But, at the same time I would also like to to see Riot grow so if you do ever make another game then please don't make it a MOBA we love the one we have now. (even if you do hear endless complaints <3)
They should, so they can stop milking on this 1 single title and actually make it good.
